name: Spellarium 7 - Match 3 Puzzle
description:
A new story and new game mechanics you've never seen before in Spellarium 7!
The world consists of 6 elements: Light, Earth, Wind, Fire, Air and Darkness. Or is there a 7th element? This time Eric has to refuel the 7th element, Time, to stop the world from decaying. As usual, some of the Match 3 levels required strategy.
- New Match 3 mechanics
- A new world in widescreen resolution
- Skippable Bonus games to complete
- play smart to complete levels quicker!
